tagline: 40 Hz Light & Sound for cognitive stimulation
featuresLong: Immerse yourself in a synchronized 40 Hz light and sound experience designed for focus and relaxation.
Select between Light + Sound, Light only, or Sound only modes to match your preference.
Set your own custom session length or pick from quick-start presets for 5, 15, or 30 minutes.
Get inspired and entertained with lighthearted “fortune cookie” proverbs during your sessions.
Use sound-only mode in the background while you browse, read, or work in other apps.

story.lede: In March 2025, I read an article from MIT about how 40 Hz gamma stimulation could promote brain health. The research suggested it might help support memory and cognitive function — and it stuck with me.

steps.title: A Spark from MIT
steps.body: That MIT study lit a fire. I wanted to see if there was a simple, everyday way for people to experience a 40 Hz rhythm — not as a lab experiment, but as a gentle, daily ritual.

steps.title: A Personal Connection
steps.body: It took me back to my mom. She was the smartest person I’ve ever known. Toward the end of her life, she didn’t recognize her own family. The brain is a mystery, and without consciousness, we aren’t truly living.

steps.title: Building Something New
steps.body: I challenged myself to build something completely new: an app that brings synchronized 40 Hz light and sound into everyday life — safely and simply.

steps.title: Purpose Beyond the App
steps.body: LucidWave is more than an app. 100% of the profit from our small subscription fee will go to brain research, so every session helps advance the science.

story.quote: This is for my mom, for everyone who has watched someone they love slip away, and for the science that might one day change that.
